answerLatex: $$x-2$$ is not a factor, and there is no factorization possible
choices: $$x-2$$ is a factor, and the factorization is $$\left(x-2\right) \left(4x^2+5x+2\right)$$

$$x-2$$ is a factor, and the factorization is $$\left(x-2\right) \left(4x^2+8x\right)$$
